title: Didn't get season rewards
body: I end season in plat 3, i didint get season rewards is that beacose i get ban for 2 weeks?

replies.body:
It depends on when the ban was issued. Below is a list of things that would disqualify you from rewards:

> - If you got a 7 day (or more) ban issued on August 7th 00:01 local server time or after, you will be ineligible to receive rewards.
* If you are actively banned on Nov 8th 00:01 local server time, you will also be ineligible.
* If you have an active chat restriction or are currently banned on Nov 8th, 00:01 local server time, you will be ineligible to receive rewards.
* If you were punished for being boosted (or the boost-ee) anytime this season, you will be ineligible for rewards.

Let me know if you have any questions.
